title: ‘Victoria’ Season 1, Episode 5 Recap: I’ll Make Love to You
text:
Before we get to this week’s episode, I need to share a bit of actual history. This is a real letter Victoria wrote to Lord Melbourne about her wedding night:
“It was a gratifying and bewildering experience. I never, never spent such an evening. His excessive love and affection gave me …read more 
Source:: KQED Pop
